name: Experienced writing
description: Content writing, copywriting, editing and proofreading (including technical, marketing, social media and education content) for various purposes and target audiences.

name: Professional translating
description: Text translating between English and Traditional Chinese and can support basic oral translating.

name: Software engineering
description: Proficient in several programming languages, front-end frameworks, development tools as well as hands-on experience in data science and AI (including deep learning models for image recognition and natural language processing, etc.)

name: Embedded/Maker project

name: Photography
